content:
ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge Class

Definition

The ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge class represents a set of site links that communicate through a transport.

In this Article

public class ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge : IDisposable
Inheritance
System.Object
ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Constructors

ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge(DirectoryContext,String)

Initializes a new instance of the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge class using the specified DirectoryContext object and name.

public ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string bridgeName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for this ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

bridgeName
String

A String that specifies the name for this ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:

  • The context parameter does not refer to a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.

  • The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

The context parameter or the bridgeName parameter is null.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

Remarks

The default ActiveDirectoryTransportType type is RPC.

ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge(DirectoryContext,String,ActiveDirectoryTransportType)

Initializes an instance of the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge class using the specified DirectoryContext object, name, and transport type.

public ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string bridgeName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for this ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

bridgeName
String

A String that specifies the name for this ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

transport
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

A ActiveDirectoryTransportType value that specifies the transport type to be used.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:

  • The context parameter does not refer to a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.

  • The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

The context parameter or the bridgeName parameter is null.

AuthenticationException

The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

transport is not a valid ActiveDirectoryTransportType value.

NotSupportedException

The transport type specified in the transport parameter is not supported.

Properties

Name

Gets the name of the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

A String that represents the name of the current site link bridge object.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SiteLinks

Gets a collection of site link objects that are associated with the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection SiteLinks { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection

A ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection object that contains ActiveDirectorySiteLink objects that are associated with the current site link bridge object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

TransportType

Gets the transport type for the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType TransportType { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

A ActiveDirectoryTransportType value that represents the transport type that is used by the current site link bridge object.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Methods

Delete()

Deletes the site link bridge.

public void Delete ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Dispose()

Releases the resources that are used by the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object.

public void Dispose ();

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

true if the managed resources should be released; false if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

FindByName(DirectoryContext,String)

Gets a ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object that matches a given directory context and name for the RPC transport protocol only.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string bridgeName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for the search.

bridgeName
String

A String that specifies the name of the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object to search for.

Returns
ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge

A ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object. null if the object was not found.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

In the context parameter that was specified, the site link bridge could not be found for the given bridgeName parameter.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

The context or the bridgeName parameter is null.

FindByName(DirectoryContext,String,ActiveDirectoryTransportType)

Gets a ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object that matches a given directory context, name, and transport type.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge FindByName (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string bridgeName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that specifies the context for the search.

bridgeName
String

A String that specifies the name of the ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object to search for.

transport
ActiveDirectoryTransportType

A ActiveDirectoryTransportType value that specifies the transport type of the object to search for.

Returns
ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge

A ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge object. null if the object was not found.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

In the context parameter that was specified, the site link bridge could not be found for the given bridgeName parameter.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:

  • The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.

  • The bridgeName parameter is an empty string.

ArgumentNullException

The context or the bridgeName parameter is null.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

The transport parameter is not a valid ActiveDirectoryTransportType value.

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

The object has been disposed.

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Returns

Exceptions
